header.logout-message: Are you sure you want to log out of SEND?

tos.title: SEND - Servizio Notifiche Digitali
tos.body: To log in, accept the Terms and Conditions of Service and read the Privacy Policy.
tos.redo-body: The Terms and Conditions of Service and the Privacy Policy have changed. To log in, accept and confirm that you have read the new versions.
tos.switch-label: I accept the <1>Terms and Conditions of Service</1> and confirm that I have read the <0>Privacy Policy</0>

date-picker.switch-to-year: calendar mode active, switch to year selection mode
date-picker.switch-to-calendar: year selection mode active, switch to calendar mode
date-picker.date-selected: Select date, the selected date is {{date}}

error-boundary.title: Something went wrong
error-boundary.description: We couldn't load the page. Reload it, or try again later.

not-accessible.title: Platform access not possible
not-accessible.description: SEND is currently being tested and is not yet available. For more information on the initiative,

access-denied: You do not have the necessary permissions to access this page
not-logged-subtitle: To view and manage your notifications, log in with SPID or CIE.

not-found.title: What you were looking for isn't here.
not-found.description: The page you tried to reach does not exist or is no longer available.

messages.404-message: An error occurred. Please try again later
messages.403-message: Enter and log in with SPID or CIE.
messages.401-message: The current user does not have the permissions
messages.500-message: Due to a temporary service issue, your request was not sent. Please try again later.
messages.lacking-grants-for-app-title: You are not authorized to access
messages.invalid-token-title: You cannot log in due to a technical issue - invalid token
messages.generic-message: An error occurred. Please try again later
messages.generic-api-error-main-text: We were unable to retrieve this data.

footer.go-to-pagopa: Link: go to PagoPA S.p.A. website
footer.social: Link: go to PagoPA S.p.A. {{social}} website
footer.legal-part-1: società per azioni with sole shareholder - share capital of euro 1,000,000 fully paid up - registered office in Rome, Piazza Colonna 370
footer.legal-part-2: CAP 00187 - n. of registration in the Rome Business Register, FC and VAT 15376371009

delivery_mandate_not_found.title: Error
delivery_mandate_not_found.message: This delegation is no longer active.

unauthorized.title: Unauthorized user
unauthorized.message: The current user does not have the permissions.

forbidden.title: Session expired
forbidden.message: Enter and log in with SPID or CIE.

not_found.title: Resource not found
not_found.message: An error occurred. Please try again later.

internal_server.title: An error occurred
internal_server.message: The service is unavailable due to a technical issue. Please try again later. If the error persists, contact support and provide the error information.

unhandled.title: An error occurred
unhandled.message: The service is unavailable. Please try again later. If the error persists, contact support and provide the error information.

unknown.title: An error occurred
unknown.message: The service is unavailable. Please try again later. If the error persists, contact support and provide the error information.

invalid_type_code.title: This field only accepts numerical values
invalid_type_code.message: Check the verification code and enter it again

empty_code.title: Code missing or incomplete
empty_code.message: The code you entered is incomplete, please enter a 5-digit code.

invalid_body.title: Invalid data
invalid_body.message: An error occurred while sending the data. Check that they are correct, without spaces or special characters, and try again. If the error persists, contact support and provide the error information.

invalid_parameter.title: Invalid data
invalid_parameter.message: One or more of the entered data are invalid

downtime_language_banner.message: The original text of these documents is in Italian. In case of conflict between the Italian version and the translations in other languages, the meaning and conditions of the Italian language shall prevail.

no-spaces-at-edges: Remove spaces at the beginning or end

inactivity.title: Are you sure you want to log out of SEND?
inactivity.body: The disconnection is in progress. If you have changed your mind, press “Keep access” within a few seconds.
